trans-unit.source: Exposes a data item in an <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection to UI Automation.

Data items that are not also <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types do not have children; however, they can have a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> tree and a corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree.
trans-unit.target: Elementos de datos que no sean también <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> tipos que no tienen elementos secundarios; sin embargo, pueden tener un <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> árbol y su correspondiente [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] árbol.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> can have a collection of strings that contain data items.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> puede tener una colección de cadenas que contienen elementos de datos.

trans-unit.source: When those items are processed by an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> for visualization, a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> tree is created for them.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se procesan los elementos por un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> para la visualización, una <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> árbol se crea para ellos.

trans-unit.source: This tree can have a corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree.
trans-unit.target: Este árbol puede tener su correspondiente [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] árbol.

trans-unit.source: After the tree is created, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] merges the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> tree into a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree.
trans-unit.target: Una vez creado el árbol, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] combina la <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> de árbol en una [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] árbol.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer> works with its <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> counterpart, if it exists, to obtain more information about the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> tree.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer> funciona con su <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> equivalente, si existe, para obtener más información sobre la <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> árbol.

trans-unit.source: Only visible data items, or more precisely, the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> trees, have this dualism.
trans-unit.target: Solo elementos de datos visibles y más concretamente, la correspondiente <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> árboles, presentan este dualismo.

trans-unit.source: Non-visible data items, which have no corresponding <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> trees, have only one <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: Elementos de datos no son visibles, que no existe la correspondiente <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> árboles, solo tiene una <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: The data item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.

The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> that holds the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection.
Provides initialization for base class values when called by the constructor of a derived class.

Gets the accelerator key for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that corresponds to the data item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.
The accelerator key.
This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey%2A> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: Gets the access key for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that corresponds to the data item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.
The access key.
This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey%2A> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that uniquely identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that corresponds to the data item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.
A string that contains the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] identifier.
The value of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] identifier is the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El valor de la [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] identificador es el <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property is not set, the value is the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> propiedad no está establecida, el valor es el <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId%2A> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that represents the bounding rectangle of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
The bounding rectangle.

The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde al elemento de datos en el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> colección que está asociado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle%2A> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that corresponds to the data item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.
The collection of child elements.
This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren%2A> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> that represents the clickable space that is on the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
The point that represents the clickable space that is on the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde al elemento de datos en el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> colección que está asociado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint%2A> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that describes the functionality of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that corresponds to the data item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.
The help text.
This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText%2A> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that conveys the visual status of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
The status.
Examples include "Busy" or "Online".

The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde al elemento de datos en el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> colección que está asociado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus%2A> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: Gets a human-readable string that contains the type of item that the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> represents.
The item type.
An example includes "Mail Message" or "Contact".

The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde al elemento de datos en el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> colección que está asociado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType%2A> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" /> that is targeted to the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer" /> for the element that is targeted by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde al elemento de datos en el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> colección que está asociado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: Gets the notification characteristics of the live region for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that corresponds to the data item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> object.
The notification characteristics of the live region.

Gets the text label of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that corresponds to the data item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.
The text label.
You can think of the name property as if it were a string of text that users use to explain which control they are referring to.
trans-unit.target: Se puede considerar la propiedad de nombre como si fuera una cadena de texto que los usuarios usan para explicar a qué control hacen referencia.

trans-unit.source: Make certain that you have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: Asegúrese de que tiene una representación textual de todos los controles en el [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] por lo que puede hacer referencia al control mediante programación en su forma adaptada.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName%2A> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> is laid out in a particular direction.
The direction of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
Optionally, the method returns <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationOrientation.None" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> is not laid out in a particular direction.

The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde al elemento de datos en el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> colección que está asociado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation%2A> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that specifies the control pattern.
Returns the object that supports the specified control pattern of the element that is associated with this automation peer.
An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is a supported value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.

If `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.VirtualizedItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> and the item is not in the visual tree, this method returns a `this` pointer.
trans-unit.target: Si `patternInterface` es <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.VirtualizedItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> y el elemento no está en el árbol visual, este método devuelve un `this` puntero.

trans-unit.source: If `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this method returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Si `patternInterface` es igual a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput?displayProperty=nameWithType>, este método devuelve un objeto que implementa el <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> interfaz.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> currently has keyboard input focus.
<see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> has keyboard input focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde al elemento de datos en el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> colección que está asociado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus%2A> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> contains data that is presented to the user.
<see langword="true" /> if the element is a content element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde al elemento de datos en el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> colección que está asociado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement%2A> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> is understood by the end user as interactive.
<see langword="true" /> if the element is a control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde al elemento de datos en el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> colección.

trans-unit.source: The user might understand the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: El usuario podría entender el <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> contribuye a la estructura lógica del control en el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement%2A> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> can receive and send events.
<see langword="true" /> if the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer can receive and send events; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde al elemento de datos en el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> colección que está asociado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled%2A> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> can accept keyboard focus.
<see langword="true" /> if the element can accept keyboard focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde al elemento de datos en el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> colección que está asociado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable%2A> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> is off the screen.
<see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> is not on the screen; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde al elemento de datos en el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> colección que está asociado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen%2A> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: This method does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: Este método no indica si el elemento está visible.

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible.
trans-unit.target: En algunas circunstancias, un elemento se encuentra en la pantalla pero aún no está visible.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is obscured by other elements, it might not be visible.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, si el elemento está oculto por otros elementos, podría no ser visible.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: En este caso, el método devuelve `false`.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> contains protected content.
<see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> contains protected content; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde al elemento de datos en el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> colección que está asociado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword%2A> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> is required to be completed on a form.
<see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> is required to be completed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde al elemento de datos en el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> colección que está asociado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm%2A> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.
The data item.
trans-unit.target: El elemento de datos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> that holds the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> object.
trans-unit.target: El <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" /> que está asociada la <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Sets the keyboard input focus on the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.

The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> corresponds to the data item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.
This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus%2A> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: Makes the virtual item fully accessible as a UI Automation element.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro es una implementación explícita de un miembro de interfaz.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IVirtualizedItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Solo se puede utilizar cuando la instancia de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer> se convierte en una interfaz <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IVirtualizedItemProvider>.
